attributes.action: Hold a referendum on EU membership before or at general election not in 2017
attributes.additional_details:
We ask that the government holds an in-out referendum of membership of the European Union before or at the time of the next general election, rather than in 2017 as proposed.

Anyone under the age of 60 has not had a chance to vote on membership of this organisation, which has changed unrecognisably since it's beginnings as the EEC.

We demand that the government call a referendum on this so that whichever party wins the next election will have a clear mandate on this issue.
